title: Kogel chisels out Kolossos oversized MTB derailleur cage for SRAM Eagle
content:
For those looking for every performance gain possible, Kogel is at it again. This time, their Kolossos oversized derailleur cage family has expanded into the world of MTB. Specifically, for the likes of SRAM Eagle rear derailleurs. You may recall that when Kogel introduced the Kolossus system for road and gravel bikes, at the time, […]

The post Kogel chisels out Kolossos oversized MTB derailleur cage for SRAM Eagle appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
